sentences.en: A universal UV sealant to protect all acrylics, wraps and gels.
sentences.cn: 保护所有水晶甲 、 假甲和凝胶甲的常用紫外线光疗密封剂.

sentences.en: A. remove the old sealant sticking to the sensor and engine.
sentences.cn: 去除粘附到传感器和发动机上的旧密封剂.

sentences.en: Apply a 6-mm (1/4-in) diameter bead of sealant to the window opening flanges.
sentences.cn: 在窗户开口凸缘，使用一个直径为6-公厘（1/4-英寸）密封剂压条。

sentences.en: Apply a non-hardening sealant to the threads of the terminal box connection port flexible metal conduit and seal fitting for waterproofing.
sentences.cn: 在接线盒连接口、挠性金属导管及密封件螺纹处涂上非硬化密封剂，用于防水。

sentences.en: Bumper Block, O - shaped Ring, V - shaped Ring, Oil Sealant and various rubber sealants.
sentences.cn: 减震块 、 “O”型圈 、 “V”型圈 、 油封及各类橡胶密封件.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Fibrin sealant occlusion method is effective for the postoperative enterocutaneous fistula.
sentences.cn: 结论: 纤维蛋白胶能有效地促进肠外瘘愈合.

sentences.en: Epoxy Products, Curings Ais for Concrete , Sealr , Sealant , Joitn, Adhesives and Sealants.
sentences.cn: 采购产品环氧基树脂产品, 机构认可的混凝土,封条, 密封剂, 黏性物和密封剂.

sentences.en: Five other epoxy adhesive include: batteries covered in sealant, a plastic column.
sentences.cn: 其他环氧胶包括: 蓄电池中盖密封胶、极柱胶.

sentences.en: Many baskets have a sealant, so you can use a nonabrasive cloth, such as a section of a cloth diaper.
sentences.cn: 许多篮子有密封剂，所以可以用不粗糙的衣服，像一小块尿布。

sentences.en: Objective: To observe the clinical application effect of pit and fissure sealant.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的: 探讨应用窝沟封闭剂预防龋齿的临床效果.

sentences.en: PU constructing joint sealant material with superior elongation and tensile strength.
sentences.cn: PU填 缝材具有极大的伸长率和抗撕裂强度,是建筑物最理想的伸缩缝材料.

sentences.en: Seal the external side of wall - through hole with sealant, putty, paint, etc.
sentences.cn: 用密封胶泥或油灰涂料等物封住室外侧的穿墙孔.

sentences.en: Sealant using amine - silane as adhesion promoter had excellent adhesion property to aluminum.
sentences.cn: 胺基硅烷作为粘接促进剂的密封胶粘接铝的强度好.

sentences.en: The characteristic and production technique of the polyurethane sealant were introduced.
sentences.cn: 简要介绍了中空玻璃用聚氨酯密封胶的特性及工艺要求.

sentences.en: The chemical industry says BPA is the safest, most effective sealant.
sentences.cn: 化工行业声称BPA是最安全最有效的密封材料。

sentences.en: The handle on the fridge door had broken off, probably decades ago, but if you pressed your fingers just right into the soft rubber sealant in the crack, you could pry it open.
sentences.cn: 冰箱门把手已折断，恐怕是几十年前就断了。 但是，如果把手指插进门缝中的密封软胶，还是可以掰开冰箱门的。

sentences.en: The preparation methods of deketoxime type one-part RTV silicone rubber sealant on spread ability and for formed in place gasket were introduced respectively.
sentences.cn: 介绍了可涂饰性及就地成形密封垫圈用脱酮肟型单组分RTV硅橡胶密封剂的配制方法。

sentences.en: The properties of the synthesized pouring sealant were tested.
sentences.cn: 测试了材料各项性能.

sentences.en: The quality of silicone sealant adhesion to anodized aluminum varies widely.
sentences.cn: 硅酮密封胶对阳极氧化铝的黏结质量千差万别.

sentences.en: The sprinkler is composed of sprinkler frame, sealant and glass bulb.
sentences.cn: 该喷头主要由喷头架 、 密封件及玻璃球组成.

sentences.en: This paper presents preparation, formula, properties and application of sealant tape.
sentences.cn: 介绍了丁基密封胶条的研制过程, 配方, 性能及应用情况.
